excerpt: Outdoor adventure water park with Thai-themed thrill & family slides, swimming pools & beach.
detail_description: Siam Park is an outdoor water park with a Thai theme, offering thrilling slides for adventure seekers and family-friendly attractions. Visitors can experience the adrenaline rush of a 28-meter vertical drop slide and artificial wave pools, while children can enjoy the dedicated play area and entertaining sea lion shows. The park also features a dolphinarium and areas for relaxation, including lazy rivers. Additionally, animal lovers can explore Jungle Park to witness captivating bird shows and observe jaguars and pumas.
name: Siam Park
address: Av. Siam, s/n, 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

excerpt: Busy stretch of shoreline for swimming & sunbathing with restaurants, lodging & an observation deck.
detail_description: Playa del Duque is a bustling beach area perfect for swimming and sunbathing, offering a resort-like atmosphere with its abundance of high-end accommodations. The beach features striped beach huts, loungers, and parasols against a backdrop of rugged cliffs, turquoise waters, and palm trees.
name: Playa del Duque
address: Spain

excerpt: Costa Adeje is a coastal part of a town and municipality in the southwestern part of the island of Tenerife, one of the Canary Islands, and part of the province of Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain. Wikipedia.
detail_description: Costa Adeje, located in the southwestern part of Tenerife, is a popular coastal area known for its tourism. It boasts wonderful year-round temperatures, making it perfect for enjoying its beautiful beaches at any time. The region is home to excellent hotel infrastructure and offers a variety of tourist activities. Adjacent to other famous holiday destinations like Los Cristianos and Playa Paraiso, Costa Adeje is part of the lively town with numerous bars, restaurants, shops, and shopping centers.
name: Costa Adeje
address: Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Siam Park is a thrilling water park that offers an array of adrenaline-pumping slides and attractions, making it more suitable for thrill-seekers. In contrast, Aqualand is better suited for families with younger children due to its kid-friendly features. While Siam Park has taller height restrictions on some of its more intense rides, both parks offer a fun-filled day out for visitors of all ages.
name: Siam park
address: Av. Siam, s/n, 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Centro Comercial Plaza del Duque is a luxurious shopping center located in the south of Tenerife, Canary Islands. Its innovative and avant-garde architecture offers a unique shopping experience. The circular complex features clothing and accessory outlets, as well as cafes and restaurants just steps away from the beach. With leading luxury brands like Hackett, Boss, and Desigual, it's a premier destination for designer goods.
name: Centro Comercial Plaza del Duque
address: C. Londres, s/n, 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

excerpt: Adeje is a municipality in southwest Tenerife, one of Spain’s Canary Islands. It’s home to Costa Adeje resort, with Siam Park, a Thai-themed water park, and many beaches, like gray-sand Playa El Duque. Northeast, Adeje town has Santa Úrsula Church, with sgraffito work and a bell gable. The Museum of Sacred Art lies underneath Plaza España square. El Barranco del Infierno is a rugged nature reserve with trails.
detail_description: Adeje, located in southwest Tenerife, is a popular destination known for its Costa Adeje resort and beautiful beaches like Playa El Duque. The town of Adeje itself boasts historical sites such as the Santa Úrsula Church and the Museum of Sacred Art. Families often choose to stay in this area due to its family-friendly accommodations and warm weather year-round. Visitors can enjoy organic farmers markets, local wines, and homemade sweets made with gofio flour.
name: Adeje
address: Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

excerpt: Open-air water park complex with huge slides & tube rides, plus kids' pools & a dolphinarium.
detail_description: Aqualand Costa Adeje is an open-air water park complex located in the lively Costa Adeje area of Tenerife. The park features a variety of thrilling slides and tube rides, as well as kids' pools and a dolphinarium where visitors can enjoy dolphin shows. Aqualand offers a perfect mix of adrenaline-pumping adventures and leisurely water-based attractions, catering to families and water enthusiasts of all ages.
name: Aqualand Costa Adeje
address: Av. Austria, 15, 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

excerpt: Scenic hiking trail in a gorge with diverse flora & fauna, plus a waterfall (reservations required).
detail_description: Barranco del Infierno, also known as Hell's Ravine, is a stunning hiking trail located just outside Adeje in southwest Tenerife. The gorge features towering waterfalls and diverse flora including rare plant species such as drago trees, wild jasmine, and cardoncillo found only in the Canaries. Access to this natural sanctuary is limited to 300 people per day, requiring a pre-arranged permit for the three-hour hike through the ravine.
name: Barranco del Infierno
address: C. de los Molinos, 46, 38670 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

excerpt: 70+ shops in an indoor-outdoor shopping mall with Thai-influenced architecture & a Zen-like vibe.
detail_description: Siam Mall is a unique shopping destination located in the heart of tourism on the island of Tenerife. This indoor-outdoor shopping mall features Thai-influenced architecture and a Zen-like vibe, offering a new concept in shopping centers. With over 70 shops dedicated to fashion, leisure, and dining, it provides one of the most complete commercial options in the Canary Islands. The mall boasts well-known brands such as Mango, Zara, Guess, Swarovski, and more.
name: Siam Mall
address: Av. Siam, 3, 38670 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: La Caleta is a charming and picturesque beach located in the beautiful city of Cadiz, Spain. This small cove is known for its calm and clear waters, making it perfect for swimming and snorkeling. The beach is lined with traditional fishermen's houses that have been converted into quaint seafood restaurants, adding to the area's authentic charm. Visitors can enjoy fresh seafood while taking in stunning views of the ocean.
name: La Caleta
address: 38679, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Puerto Colón, located in the heart of the Zec zone for the conservation of cetaceans, is a prime departure point for sea excursions. These trips offer opportunities to witness an array of marine life, including up to 29 species of cetaceans, 4 types of sea turtles, and 11 varieties of seabirds against the stunning backdrop of El Teide. For those seeking adventure on the water, jet skiing is a popular activity here.
name: Puerto Colón
address: puerto colon, Playa de la Américas, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: The Monte Cristo catamaran offers an unforgettable experience for whale and dolphin watching in Tenerife. With a maximum of 24 people on board, the tour provides a personalized setting with knowledgeable guides. Guests can enjoy sightings of dolphins and pilot whales while being served delicious drinks, and even have the opportunity to snorkel. The pleasant atmosphere, quality food and drinks, as well as excellent service make this tour highly sought after, so it's recommended to book in advance.
name: Monte Cristo Catamaran, 5-star Whale and Dolphin Tours, Boat Trips Tenerife
address: Puerto Colon Pantalan 6, 38680 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

excerpt: Popular, tourist-friendly beach with palm trees, calm water & access to beach bars, shops & eats.
detail_description: Fañabé Beach is a popular and tourist-friendly destination located on Tenerife's south coast. It boasts palm trees, calm waters, and easy access to beach bars, shops, and dining options. Stretching over 500 meters with prestigious blue flag status for water quality and cleanliness, this golden sand beach stands out for its infrastructure and amenities. It is well-loved by both locals and tourists alike due to the good state of its waters and the lively atmosphere in the terrace areas.
name: Fañabé Beach
address: Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

excerpt: Many species live in this big wildlife park with suspension bridges & waterfalls, plus animal shows.
detail_description: Jungle Park is a large wildlife park featuring suspension bridges, waterfalls, and animal shows. Visitors can spend the day observing big cats and monkeys, enjoying activities like a dry bobsleigh track and walking along a rope walkway in the trees. The park offers regular bird shows with birds of prey, macaws, talking parrots, and hornbills. Additionally, there's an opportunity for a sea lion encounter.
name: Jungle Park
address: Urb. Águilas del Teide, s/n, Km. 3, 38640 Arona, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

excerpt: Breeding center offering camel rides & close encounters with donkeys, goats & other farm animals.
detail_description: Camel Park, nestled in the picturesque town of La Camella in southern Tenerife, is a delightful breeding center that offers visitors an unforgettable experience with camels and other charming farm animals like donkeys, goats, and ducks. Just a short drive from popular resorts such as Los Cristianos and Playa de las Americas, this serene park is set within a lush rural landscape.
name: Camel Park
address: Ctra. General, 65, 38627 Los Cristianos, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Fañabe Market, also known as Costa Adeje Market, is a popular outdoor shopping center centrally located near many hotels. Visitors can find a variety of products such as bags, handbags, belts, t-shirts, beachwear, footwear, and jewelry. The market offers the opportunity to barter for the best prices and even features copies of well-known brands. Additionally, there are options for grabbing a snack or coffee while taking a break from shopping.
name: Fañabe Market
address: Av. de Bruselas, 7948, 38679 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Casa Fuerte in Adeje is a significant historical site that showcases the town's rich history. Dating back to the 16th century, this fortress was originally built as a defense against pirate attacks and served as the center of the city for over three centuries. It also housed an important historical archive, now preserved at the Canary Islands Museum in Las Palmas.
name: Casa Fuerte (Adeje)
address: C. de los Molinos, 1A, 38670 Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Costa Adeje is a stunning destination known for its spotless blue flag beaches, featuring soft white sand and clear waters. The beaches, such as Playa Puerto Colon, Playa Fanabe, and Playa Torviscas, offer plenty of sunbeds and parasols along with a traffic-free promenade lined with bars and restaurants. These beaches are sheltered by breakwaters, ensuring safe swimming conditions without strong currents.
name: Costa Adeje
address: 38679 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Aqua Club Termal is a renowned spa located in the southern area of Tenerife, specifically in the coastal town of Adeje. It boasts an expansive area covering 1000 square meters of thermal waters at a comfortable 34 degrees Celsius and 800 square meters dedicated to various facilities such as gyms, massage rooms, and other amenities. The VIP thermal circuit offered by Aqua Club Termal spans over 2.
name: Aqua Club Termal
address: C. Galicia, 6, 38660 Torvisca Alto, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

name: Jet ski island Tenerife
address: Puerto Colón, pantalán, número 9, 38660 Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

name: Royal Delfin Catamaran – Tenerife Dolphin Whale Watching & Underwater Views
address: Puerto Colón, Calle Colon, Pantalán 12, 38660 Playa de la Américas, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Plaza de España in Adeje offers a unique perspective on the city's history and is located near the well-tended Parque de la Puerta de Tierra. Situated on the edge of a deep barranco, it is surrounded by historic buildings and an old church, providing a charming setting to relax in the shade of trees. Visitors can also enjoy cultural events such as masses, beautiful churches, bands, and fireworks during special occasions like the week of Saint Ursula.
name: Plaza de España (Adeje)
address: 38670 Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

excerpt: Sandy strip with sunset views, surrounded by shops, restaurants, hotels & entertainment venues.
detail_description: Playa La Pinta Puerto Colón is a picturesque sandy beach offering stunning sunset views and a relaxed atmosphere. Nestled in the heart of Costa Adeje, it's an ideal destination for families with its calm waters and diverse range of activities. From water sports to children's parks, there's something for everyone. The beach boasts clear, tranquil waters perfect for swimming and features inflatables that keep kids entertained while adults can unwind with a drink.
name: Playa La Pinta Puerto Colón
address: Urbanizacion San Eugenio, 26, 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Playa de Ajabo is a delightful seaside destination that offers visitors an exquisite beach experience. The pristine shoreline, adorned with no-cost parasols, boasts dark and velvety sand, providing a unique sensation underfoot. Though the occasional robust waves necessitate caution for young ones, adept swimmers will find no obstacles in their path. Noteworthy sightings include a splendid sea turtle frequenting the area's favored feeding grounds located a couple of miles away.
name: Playa de Ajabo
address: 38678, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

excerpt: Popular for water sports & lined with eateries, this urban beach offers chair rentals & a boardwalk.
detail_description: Playa del Bobo is a serene urban beach in Costa Adeje, perfect for those seeking a quieter atmosphere. Unlike other beaches in the area, it prohibits water sports, making it an ideal spot for peaceful swimming and relaxation. The fine grey-brownish sand invites sunbathers while shallow waters are safe for children to splash around. Lined with eateries and featuring a delightful boardwalk, this beachfront offers chair rentals and a tranquil ambiance.
name: Playa del Bobo
address: 38660, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

name: La Caleta de Adeje
address: 464R+3Q, 38679 La Caleta, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Playa Del Puertito De Adeje is a hidden gem that beautifully marries golden sands with intriguing rock pools teeming with vibrant marine life. This crescent-shaped beach exudes a charming local vibe, making it an ideal spot for relaxation and exploration. From July to September, you might even catch sight of Loggerhead Turtles! The soft sand invites you to unwind while the gentle waves create perfect conditions for swimming and snorkeling.
name: Playa Del Puertito De Adeje
address: Pje Puertito Sau, 18, 38678 El Puertito, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: X-Sur Centro Comercial is the second largest shopping center in Costa Adeje, offering a wide range of shops focusing on leisure, sports, and fashion. Visitors can also find a Mercadona supermarket and a large food court with diverse culinary options ranging from Asian takeaways to coffee bars. One of its highlights is the modern cinema featuring seven screening rooms. The atmosphere is charming, complemented by an array of restaurants catering to various tastes.
name: X-Sur Centro Comercial
address: C. Lisboa, 2, 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Jungle Adventure Tenerife, located in the X-Sur shopping center, Costa Adeje, offers an unforgettable jungle journey for little explorers. The park provides a wide range of engaging activities for kids of all ages, including colorful playground equipment and entertaining staff. Families can expect a well-maintained and clean environment that ensures a safe and inviting experience. Visitors have praised the attentive and kind-hearted management, particularly highlighting their dedication to ensuring children have a great time.
name: Jungle Adventure Tenerife
address: X-Sur, C. Lisboa, 2, Centro Comercial, 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: El Balito is a hidden gem, a stunning bay that offers the chance of solitude. Accessible via a rocky but navigable path, it's advisable to park at the top and make the 300-meter descent on foot due to worsening road conditions. Despite the appearance of dilapidated buildings in the area, once you arrive, it's a fantastic spot for diving and snorkeling with no crowds in sight.
name: El Balito
address: 38678 Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: Pescadora is a monument located at the entrance of Puerto de Santiago, dedicated to the fish sellers who were vital to the town's economy in the past. The sculpture depicts a fisherwoman carrying fish in a basket and a bucket, symbolizing the importance of fishing in this area. It is well-maintained with water fountains around it, but traffic around the roundabout can be challenging. This monument holds historical significance for the community as it represents their heritage as a former fishing village.
name: Pescadora
address: C. Juan Manuel Capdevielle San Martín, s/n, 38683 Santiago del Teide, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

detail_description: El Galeón Park is an incredible destination that is highly recommended for visitors. It is advisable to visit during the evening hours in order to fully appreciate its beauty. While the quality of food at the restaurant remains unknown, it is worth taking a chance and dining there. Although not expansive in size, it offers about an hour's walk with opportunities to capture memorable pictures.
name: El Galeón Park
address: Av. del Poniente, 38670 Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

name: Mirador de Fañabe
address: C. Baleares, 13, 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

name: ARTROOM by Sábila
address: 38660 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain

name: ESCULTURA "AMOR" COSTA ADEJE
address: C. Unterhacing, 38679 Costa Adeje, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Spain
